page.title: 08Bilton Grange School,Rugby
page.content: Grid ref.493717 Bilton Grange (boys) and Homefield (girls) are private boarding schools educate children of 4-13 years.There are 42 staff.Science,Maths,English,Classics, Modern Languages,Music,Sports,Drama and Scripture are taught in small classes.School life is enjoyable with activities such as Sports,T.V.,Radio and Videos.There is a swimming pool and a new sports hall was opened in 1983.Boarders sleep in dormitories of 8-12 beds.The school chapel is used for a daily service and Weddings and Baptisms which are reg. at St. Marks Church,Bilton,Rugby.The uniform is navy blue and grey.If children are ill they go to the sick-bay.Most children see relatives once a term.The children take a Common Entrance exam for a public school.
